author: Aaron Calvin, Maxwell Strachan
title: Wells Fargo Call Center Workers in 4 States Test Positive for COVID-19
description: The company says it's trying to improve the situation but continues to require that call center employees come into work. “We’re all at risk right now,” one employee said.
content: In the weeks since Wells Fargo decided that its workers must continue to commute into call centers despite the rising threat of coronavirus, employees for the bank have tested positive for COVID-19 at call centers in at least four different states, VICE has l… [+10326 chars]
